database

Class FinanceDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.FinanceDAO

  • public class FinanceDAO
extends Object
    FinanceDAO handles transactions between users, debt and income.

    • Method Detail

      • getDebt

        public static ArrayList<Debt> getDebt(int userId)
        Gets the debt of a user
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user to get debt for.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Debt objects.

      • getIncome

        public static ArrayList<Debt> getIncome(int userId)
        Gets what other people owe a given user
        Parameters:
        userId - the user to get income for.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Debt objects.

      • deleteDebt

        public static void deleteDebt(int fromUser,
                              int toUser)
        Deletes a debt from the database
        Parameters:
        fromUser - the 'from' user on the debt.
        toUser - the 'to' user on the debt.

      • updateFinance

        public static boolean updateFinance(int userId,
                                    double sum,
                                    List<User> contributors)
        Updates the users debt according to what they owed each other from before.
        Parameters:
        userId - id of the user who buys the items
        sum - the total sum
        contributors - users that will split the sum
        Returns:
        true or false, true if the update goes well, else false
